13#ifndef _TH_FILE_H
14#define _TH_FILE_H
15#if _MSC_VER>=1500
16/* visual studio 9 and above needs sal.h before th_types.h to avoid conflicts */
17#include <sal.h>
18#include <sys/stat.h>
19#endif
20#include "th_cfg.h"
21#include "th_types.h"
22#include "th_al.h"
23
24#if HAVE_STAT_H
25#include <stat.h>
26#elif HAVE_SYS_STAT_H
27#include <sys/stat.h>
28#elif PRIVATE_STAT_H
29typedef struct stat stat;
30#elif STUB_STAT
31 struct stat {
32 int st_size;
33 };
34#else
35#error "struct stat not defined!"
36#endif
37
38/* File I/O - Streams */
39#if (!USE_TH_FILEIO) && (!defined(ee_FILE))
40 #define ee_FILE FILE
41 #ifndef FILE_TYPE_DEFINED
42 typedef struct FILE FILE;
43 #define FILE_TYPE_DEFINED 1
44 #endif
45 #define ee_DIR DIR
46#endif
47#ifndef ee_stat
48 #define ee_stat stat
49#endif
50
51#if NEED_SEEK_PARAMS
52 #define SEEK_SET 0 /* Seek from beginning of file. */
53 #define SEEK_CUR 1 /* Seek from current position. */
54 #define SEEK_END 2 /* Seek from end of file. */
55#endif
56
57#if NEED_STD_FILES
58 extern void *th_stdin;
59 extern void *th_stdout;
60 extern void *th_stderr;
61#endif
62
63int th_fclose (ee_FILE *fp);
64int th_ferror (ee_FILE *fp);
65int th_feof (ee_FILE *fp);
66void th_clearerr(ee_FILE *fp);
67int th_fileno (ee_FILE *fp);
68int th_fflush (ee_FILE *fp);
69int th_fprintf (ee_FILE *fp, const char* format, ...);
70int th_vfprintf(ee_FILE *fp, const char *format, va_list ap);
71int th_fseek (ee_FILE *fp, long int offset, int whence);
72long th_ftell (ee_FILE *fp);
73int th_fscanf(ee_FILE *stream, const char *format, ...);
74
75/* DIRENT routines, and helpers */
76
77char *th_getcwd (char *buffer, size_t size);
78char *th_getwd (char *buffer);
79int th_chdir (const char *filename);
80/* TODO: Initial version of MITH, no support for DIRENT!
81ee_DIR *th_opendir (const char *dirname);
82struct ee_dirent *th_readdir (ee_DIR *dirstream);
83int th_closedir (ee_DIR *dirstream);
84void th_rewinddir(ee_DIR *dirstream);
85*/
86int th_stat (const char *path, void * buf);
87int th_lstat (const char *path, void * buf);
88int th_fstat (int fildes, void * buf);
89int th_unlink (const char *filename);
90int th_rename(const char *oldpath, const char *newpath);
91
92/* Basic file I/O routines */
93
94int th_putc (int c, ee_FILE *fp);
95int th_getc (ee_FILE *fp);
96int th_fputs (const char *s, ee_FILE *fp);
97int th_ungetc (int size, ee_FILE *fp);
98char *th_fgets (char *string,int count,ee_FILE *fp);
99size_t th_fread (void *buf, size_t size, size_t count, ee_FILE *fp);
100size_t th_fwrite (const void *buf, size_t size, size_t count, ee_FILE *fp);
101ee_FILE *th_fopen (const char *filename, const char *mode);
102ee_FILE *th_fdopen (int fildes, const char *mode);
103ee_FILE *th_freopen (const char *filename, const char *mode, ee_FILE *fp);
104ee_FILE *th_tmpfile (void);
105char *th_mktemp (char *templat);
106
107int th_fscanf(ee_FILE *stream, const char *format, ...);
108int th_vfscanf(ee_FILE *stream, const char *format, va_list ap);
109int th_sscanf(const char *str, const char *format, ...);
110/* NON Standard File I/O Routines */
111
112int th_filecmp (const char *file1, const char *file2);
113ee_FILE *th_fcreate (const char *filename, const char *mode, char *data, size_t size);
114size_t th_fsize (const char *filename);
115#ifndef FILENAME_MAX
116#define FILENAME_MAX 256
117#endif
118
119/* Common kernel functions */
120void get_auto_data_int(char *fname,e_s32 **out,int *numread);
121void get_auto_data_dbl(char *fname,e_f64 **out,int *numread);
122void get_auto_data_byte(char *fname,e_u8 **out,int *numread);
123
124#endif /* _TH_FILE_H */
